mapper.select: select tt.batchName as batchName,count(*) as majorNumber,sum(tt.planEnrollingNumber) as planEnrollingNumber from zgk2.zgk_university_trine tt INNER JOIN zgk2.zgk_major_base bb on tt.majorCode=bb.major_code INNER JOIN zgk2.zgk_university uu on uu.id=tt.universityId where tt.areaId=#{areaId} and tt.year=#{year} and tt.batchName in ('第一批提前批','第二批提前批','第三批提前批','高职提前批') GROUP BY tt.batchName
